price: Na ama yule kijana, wazazi wake walikuwa ni Waumini. Tukakhofu asije watia mashakani kwa uasi na ukafiri.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡغُلَٰمُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤۡمِنَيۡنِ فَخَشِينَآ أَن يُرۡهِقَهُمَا طُغۡيَٰنٗا وَكُفۡرٗا
footnotes: Ama yule kijana niliye muuwa, baba yake na mama yake walikuwa ni Waumini. Tulikuwa tunajua kuwa angeli ishi angeli kuwa ndio sababu ya ukafiri wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā al-ghulāmu fakāna abawāhu mu'minayni fakhashīnā an yur'hiqahumā ṭugh'yānan wakuf'ran
